cc.stroke

Interface ChineseCharacterTypeBolder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicBolder, EmptyBolder, FunctinoalBasicBolder, RadialBolder

    public interface ChineseCharacterTypeBolder
    物件活字筆劃加寬工具包。包裝產生Stroke的介面。因為BasicStroke 無法直接用物件直接產生不同粗細的物件，所以用來包裝給PieceAdjuster用。

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Stroke getStroke(double width)
      取得筆劃加寬物件

    • Method Detail

      • getStroke

        java.awt.Stroke getStroke(double width)
        取得筆劃加寬物件
        Parameters:
        width - 加寬的寬度
        Returns:
        筆劃加寬物件
